subject: Your Volcanoes & Lake Kivu memories
summary: Three unforgettable days in Rwanda with gorilla trekking, night market tastings, and a sunset sail on Lake Kivu.
highlights: Silverback family Umubano spotted within 45 minutes of trek start.
Canoe concierge surprised the group with live Intore dance performance.
Wallet credits issued for weather delay at Bisate.
preview_html: Murakoze cyane for traveling with ecoTrips. Here's a recap of your Volcanoes adventure with photos, ledger highlights, and offline bundle links.
